      Methods in org.elasticsearch.search.facet.range that return RangeFacetBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RangeFacetBuilder RangeFacetBuilder.addRange(double from, double to)
      Adds a range entry with explicit from and to.
      RangeFacetBuilder RangeFacetBuilder.addRange(String from, String to) 
      RangeFacetBuilder RangeFacetBuilder.addUnboundedFrom(double to)
      Adds a range entry with explicit to and unbounded from.
      RangeFacetBuilder RangeFacetBuilder.addUnboundedFrom(String to) 
      RangeFacetBuilder RangeFacetBuilder.addUnboundedTo(double from)
      Adds a range entry with explicit from and unbounded to.
      RangeFacetBuilder RangeFacetBuilder.addUnboundedTo(String from) 
      RangeFacetBuilder RangeFacetBuilder.facetFilter(FilterBuilder filter)
      An additional filter used to further filter down the set of documents the facet will run on.
      RangeFacetBuilder RangeFacetBuilder.field(String field)
      The field name to perform the range facet.
      RangeFacetBuilder RangeFacetBuilder.global(boolean global)
      Should the facet run in global mode (not bounded by the search query) or not (bounded by the search query).
      RangeFacetBuilder RangeFacetBuilder.keyField(String keyField)
      The field name to use in order to control where the hit will "fall into" within the range entries.
      RangeFacetBuilder RangeFacetBuilder.nested(String nested)
      Sets the nested path the facet will execute on.
      RangeFacetBuilder RangeFacetBuilder.valueField(String valueField)
      The field name to use as the value of the hit to compute data based on values within the interval (for example, total).
